title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories for the x axis representing Teams, and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Hendrick_Motorsports where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 180.0.
The lowest category is found at Front_Row_Motorsports where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 19.0.
gold: The statistic ranks the racing teams of NASCAR according to revenue in 2017 . Hendrick Motorsports generated 180 million U.S. dollars in revenue in 2017 .
